item.title: Rfd Npc Help Easy [pi] paying 20 dollars
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

try this one, im pretty sure it’l work.

if (npcs.npcType == 1472)
{
c.getItems().addItem(19864,150);
c.getItems().bankItem(19864, 150);
c.sendMessage(“The items have been stored in you’re bank!”);
}

item.title: Rfd Npc Help Easy [pi] paying 20 dollars
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

erh I think this might work but not completely sure so, go ahead and give it a try,

if (npcs.npcType == 1472)
{
c.getItems().addItem(19864,150);
c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[item], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.playerItems[item]), c.playerItemsN[item]);
int[][] items = (19864,150);
c.sendMessage(“The items have been stored in you’re bank!”);
}

item.title: Rfd Npc Help Easy [pi] paying 20 dollars
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

Hi so i want to know a couple things, i want to make is so if that you kill an monster you get the items stored in the bank
but i have a probleme heres the code it spawns in inventory
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1472)
c.getItems().addItem(19864,150);
please make it spawn in bank thanks, brandon
also make it send a messege like
c.sendMessage(“The items have been stored in you’re bank!”);

Heres another code to work with i dont want it to send ivy items to bank i want it to like spawn items and send to bank
for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
}
}
